findings.title: INSUFFICIENT_0_AMOUNT
findings.description: Implicit assumption on _addLiquidity() routine without explicit checks for amount0Desired >= amount0Min, leading to potential slippage control issues.

findings.title: INSUFFICIENT_1_AMOUNT
findings.description: Implicit assumption on amount1Desired and amount1Min in _addLiquidity() function may lead to uncontrolled slippage.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the Zenlink Hybrid AMM protocol, there is a special administrative account (admin). This admin account plays a critical role in governing and regulating the protocol-wide operations.
